name: SkillStrike
description:
SkillStrike is a game about swiftly defeating enemies to progress and get a high score.

You are given skills that can be activated during battle at the expense of AP, which you can use to attack enemies in different ways.

This is a game I am developing for a school project. It is a demo of a full game coming out in about a month.

Please report bugs or exploits to me so that I can fix them for the final release.

@pibolib | pibolib.xyz
